org.apache.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.attributeclassobservers

Class NominalAttributeClassObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.samoa.moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • org.apache.samoa.moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
        • org.apache.samoa.moa.classifiers.core.attributeclassobservers.NominalAttributeClassObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, Serializable, AttributeClassObserver, DiscreteAttributeClassObserver, MOAObject, OptionHandler

    public class NominalAttributeClassObserver
extends AbstractOptionHandler
implements DiscreteAttributeClassObserver
    Class for observing the class data distribution for a nominal attribute. This observer monitors the class distribution of a given attribute. Used in naive Bayes and decision trees to monitor data statistics on leaves.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
